descriptionHtml:
Atmora : The land of truth

Lore :
Atmora is the continent to the north of Tamriel, tradition holds that it was from here that the first humans came to Tamriel.
There is some suggestion that, as of the early Third Era, it was still inhabited. However, expeditions there in the mid to late Third Era only found a place of permanent winter, with little life and no sign of human habitation. It\'s suspected that the land no longer supports any civilized life


Features
4 weapons
4 types of protonord undead (leveled)
\'\'custom\'\' weather (compatible with COT but uses moded vanilla for know , but I will do a COT version )
Weapon stats (the 3d mesh is that of the nord hero)

Proto Nord War Axe
DMG 16
reach 1.0000
Speed 1.3000
Crit DMG 6
Crit mult 2.0000

ProtoNord BattleAxe
DMG 41
reach 1.0000
Speed 0.3400
Crit DMG 5
Crit mult 0.9000

ProtoNordGreatsword
DMG 23
reach 1.4500
Speed 0.5500
Crit DMG 25
Crit mult 1.5000

ProtoNordSword
DMG 8 
reach 1.0000
Speed 2.0000
Crit DMG 21
Crit mult 10.0000
How to get there?
go to solitude , there is a new boat there . walk on it and you will be able to go there.

The mod is ready for play , but as with all my landscape mods , it will be expanded but unlike falkreath creek , this version IS made to be played and is not an alpha but rather a finshed
product that will be expanded on.
Plans for the future?
nothing to extreme apart from that I will be adding more terrain to the north but it will be very barren.
but I will also be updating falkreath creek and giving you more landscape mods , also working on skywind and beyond skyrim
Have fun !
author: C0331 AKA privata
